RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LBVWS_PAY_RECV_MASTER.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBVWS_PAY_RECV_COMPS.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBVWS_PAY_RECV_MASTER.EVENT_SEQ_NO = LBVWS_PAY_RECV_COMPS.EVENT_SEQ_NO AND LBVWS_PAY_RECV_MASTER.SOURCE_REF_NO = LBVWS_PAY_RECV_COMPS.SOURCE_REF_NO

LBVWS_PAY_RECV_COMPS.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_PAY_RECV_DUE_DETAIL.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBVWS_PAY_RECV_COMPS.component = LBTBS_PAY_RECV_DUE_DETAIL.component AND LBVWS_PAY_RECV_COMPS.event_seq_no = LBTBS_PAY_RECV_DUE_DETAIL.event_seq_no AND LBVWS_PAY_RECV_COMPS.source_ref_no = LBTBS_PAY_RECV_DUE_DETAIL.source_ref_no

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select distinct event_code, event_seq_no from lbtbs_pay_recv_due_detail where contract_ref_no = ?
